_sText:
REQUIRES CS_SONICSCHOOLHOUSE FOR TEXTURES. IF YOU DON'T HAVE IT INSTALLED, YOU WILL HAVE MISSING TEXTURES. FIND IT HERE.

cs_sonicschoolhouse, now at night!
A map I've wanted to publish for a while. This is actually a ported map from Garry's Mod by Steam user Cookie Senpai. I had fun playing this map by myself with bots. So since I've joined the GameBanana community, the idea of finally publishing this struck me.

Anyways, this is a hostage rescue map along with complete bot navigation. The map has 9 hostages within it. Like my previously uploaded map, this has no map overview/radar due to my resolution on my computer.

Have fun! ;)
